entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -22.3°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
